results.content: I did learn how to consume an API in this course, which was my main objective, however, many of the API websites have moved and some of the code presented is deprecated. Also, the pace of the instructor was too fast. Explanations of how things work were also pretty vague. Overall, it felt rushed... but I did learn from the course. Thank you!

response.content: Thank you for sharing your review and feedback

results.content: This course is good for absolute beginners, some html knowledge is needed, can of course be googled. I love the explanation of apis, how to use them, apply them, and use them in real time. Provided use of XMLHttpRequest and Fetch, love everything about this course.
